Class Animation

java.lang.Object
Animation
public class Animation
extends java.lang.Object
A class that stores an animation clip in a series of frames.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Animation​(int rate, java.lang.String[] fileNames)
    Creates a new Animation clip
    Animation​(int rate, java.lang.String[] fileNames, boolean singleUse)
    Creates a new Animation clip

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int getFrameRate()
    Returns the frame rate of the animation clip.
    mayflower.MayflowerImage getNextFrame()
    Gets the next frame in the animation.
    void mirrorHorizontally()
    Flips the animation horizontally.
    void scale​(int w, int h)
    Changes the size of the animation.
    void setBounds​(int x, int y, int w, int h)
    Cuts the images for the animation
    void setTransparency​(int u)
    Changes the transparency of the animation

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Animation

      public Animation​(int rate, java.lang.String[] fileNames, boolean singleUse)
      Creates a new Animation clip
      Parameters:
      rate - The frame rate for the animation
      fileNames - A string array containing the names for each of the frames in order.
      singleUse - Whether the animation runs only once. Ex: if true the animation will run only once and destroy itself.

    • Animation

      public Animation​(int rate, java.lang.String[] fileNames)
      Creates a new Animation clip
      Parameters:
      rate - The frame rate for the animation
      fileNames - A string array containing the names for each of the frames in order.

  • Method Details

    • getFrameRate

      public int getFrameRate()
      Returns the frame rate of the animation clip.
      Returns:
      An int representing the frame rate of the Animation clip.

    • getNextFrame

      public mayflower.MayflowerImage getNextFrame()
      Gets the next frame in the animation.
      Returns:
      A MayflowerImage which is the next frame. null, if the Animation is single use and all frames are used.

    • scale

      public void scale​(int w, int h)
      Changes the size of the animation.
      Parameters:
      w - Width in pixels.
      h - Height in pixels.

    • setTransparency

      public void setTransparency​(int u)
      Changes the transparency of the animation
      Parameters:
      u - An int value 0-100 representing transparency. 0 is fully transparent, 100 is fully opaque.

    • mirrorHorizontally

      public void mirrorHorizontally()
      Flips the animation horizontally.

    • setBounds

      public void setBounds​(int x, int y, int w, int h)
      Cuts the images for the animation
      Parameters:
      x -
      y -
      w -
      h -
